Constructor Detail

NotificationManager

public NotificationManager(List<Notification> lNotifications,
                           List<Notifable> lNotifables,
                           ShanksSimulation simulation)
Constructor with predefined notification list.

Parameters:
lNotifications - the predefined list of notifications, probably a list from an old simulation.
lNotifables - the predefined list of notifables elements, probably a list from an old simulation.
simulation - a reference to the simulation object, needed to obtain information for each notification.

NotificationManager

public NotificationManager(ShanksSimulation simulation)
Default constructor. NotificatioManager needs a reference to the simulation to work properly.

Parameters:
simulation - a reference to the simulation object, needed to obtain information for each notification.
Method Detail

addNotification

public static void addNotification(Notification n)
The user can use this method to add notifications manually.

Parameters:
n - the notification to add.

addNotification

public static void addNotification(Event e,
                                   String interaction)
Whenever a new event triggers it will use this method to add the corresponding notification to the notification lists.

Parameters:
e - the event that for the notification.
interaction -

getByID

public Notification getByID(String id)
Search for a notification with the given id.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of the wanted notification.
Returns:
the notification founded or null if no one can be found.

getByStep

public List<Notification> getByStep(int step)
Search for notifications saved on the given step.

Parameters:
step - the simulation step number from which the notifications are asked
Returns:
a List with the notifications that match the given step or null if no one can be found.

getBySource

public List<Notification> getBySource(Object source)
Search for notifications originated from the given source object.

Parameters:
source - the object of the simulation that generates the notifications
Returns:

getByInteraction

public List<Notification> getByInteraction(String interaction)
Search for notifications of interaction type that match the given class name.

Parameters:
interaction - the class that defines the interaction type of desired notifications.
Returns:
a List with the notifications founded that match the given class name.

getByTarget

public List<Notification> getByTarget(Object target)
Search for notifications of interaction type that match the given target object .

Parameters:
target - the target object from which notifications are asked.
Returns:
a List with notifications founded that match the given target object.

getByElementID

public List<ValueNotification> getByElementID(String elementID)
Search for notifications of ElementValue type that match the given element identifier.

Parameters:
elementID - the identifier of the element that was notified.
Returns:
A list with the notifications saved for the given element identifier.

getByType

public ArrayList<Notification> getByType(Class<?> type)
Search for notifications that match the corresponding notifications realization.

Parameters:
type - can be InteractionNotification.class or ElementValueNotification.class
Returns:
a List with all notifications from the selected type.

step

public void step(sim.engine.SimState arg0)
When the setp of NotificationManager its called generates a notification for each notifable that has been added to it.

Specified by:
step in interface sim.engine.Steppable
